title: External systems
content:
Service Management provides a case exchange framework to exchange data between Service Management and other products. The case exchange framework enables you to define an external system with which information will be exchanged.

The following integrations are supported:

  • Service Manager (SM). The SM integration uses the Active/Passive case exchange protocol. In this protocol, all actions are initiated in the external system and no configuration of REST operations is required in Service Management. The On-Premises Bridge isn't involved in the integration; only the Case exchange API is required. For more information, see External systems - Service Manager integration.
  • Operations Manager i (OMi). The OMi integration uses the Active/Active case exchange protocol. In this protocol, actions are initiated from both sides and REST operations are configured in Service Management. The On-Premises Bridge is used in the integration and REST server functionality is required on the external system. For more information, see Integrate with Operations Manager i.
  • Case exchange integration for changes. The Case exchange integration for change records uses the Active/Passive case exchange protocol. In this protocol, all actions are initiated in the external system and no configuration of REST operations is required in Service Management. The On-Premises Bridge isn't involved in the integration; only the Case exchange API is required. For more information, see Case Exchange integration for changes.
